description: From a series of five lithographs for Der Lebende Leichnam (The Living Corpse) by Leo Tolstoy, published by Karl Lang Verlag in Darmstadt, 1919; housed in a beige portfolio case with a gray binding; figure in bottom center of image dressed in black and hunched over a table with his fingers grasping the sides of the table and his chin resting on the corner of the table
portfolio: From Plate 2 from Der Lebende Leichnam (The Living Corpse), Leo Tolstoy, published by Karl Lang Verlag in Darmstadt, 1919
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté
title: Fedja Before Maschas's Visit, Plate 2 from Der Lebende Leichnam (The Living Corpse)
